meanings.definition: To present voluntarily and without expecting compensation.
meanings.sent1: She gave her friend a gift.
meanings.sent2: He gave his seat to the elderly lady on the bus.
meanings.sent3: The magician gave away his secrets to the audience.
meanings.sent4: The sun gave its warmth to the flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The teacher gave her students valuable advice before the exam.

meanings.definition: To transfer possession of something to someone else.
meanings.sent1: Mom gave me her old necklace.
meanings.sent2: He gave the keys to his brother before leaving.
meanings.sent3: The cat gave its toy mouse to the dog as a peace offering.
meanings.sent4: The wind gave its whispers to the leaves of the trees.
meanings.sent5: The farmer gave the harvest to the community for free.

meanings.sent1: The restaurant gave us a delicious meal.
meanings.sent2: She gave her team the necessary tools to succeed.
meanings.sent3: The clouds gave the sky a beautiful painting at sunset.
meanings.sent4: The river gave life to the surrounding forest.
meanings.sent5: The library gave access to a world of knowledge to the students.
